verses.verse: A Song of Ascents; of David. Behold, how <S%H2896>good<s%> and how <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> it is For <S%H251>brethren<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> in <S%H3162>unity<s%>!

It is like the <S%H2896>precious<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%>, That ran <S%H3381>down<s%> upon the <S%H2206>beard<s%>, Even <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H2206>beard<s%>; That came <S%H3381>down<s%> upon the <S%H6310>skirt<s%> of his <S%H4060>garments<s%>;

Like the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>, That cometh <S%H3381>down<s%> upon the <S%H2042>mountains<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: For there <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%>, Even <S%H2416>life<s%> for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
